CODE          	LONG DESCRIPTION            	SHORT DESCRIPTION    
1            	STANDARD                         	STRD                      
2            	LIMITED                          	LIMT                      
3            	RESTRICTED                       	REST                       
4            	EXPERIMENTAL                     	EXPT                       
5            	PROVISIONAL                      	PROV                       
6            	MULTIPLE                         	MULT                      
8            	SPECIAL FLIGHT PERMIT            	FERY                       
99999        	AIRWORTHINESS CLASS              	ERROR MESSAGE
